title: List of all Android material  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android material  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: MaterialDesignLibrary
repoList.description: This is a library with components of Android L to you use in android 2.2

repoList.name: material
repoList.description: A library to bring fully animated Material Design components to pre-Lolipop Android.

repoList.name: MaterialViewPager
repoList.description: A Material Design ViewPager easy to use library

repoList.name: MaterialChipsInput
repoList.description: Implementation of Material Design Chips component for Android

repoList.name: folding-cell-android
repoList.description: :octocat: 📃  FoldingCell is a material design expanding content cell inspired by folding paper material made by @Ramotion

repoList.name: MaterialDrawer
repoList.description: The flexible, easy to use, all in one drawer library for your Android project. Now brand new with material 2 design.

repoList.name: MaterialIntroView
repoList.description: Material Intro View is a showcase android library.

repoList.name: candybar-library
repoList.description: Android icon pack material dashboard

repoList.name: paper-onboarding-android
repoList.description: :octocat: PaperOnboarding is a material design slider made by @Ramotion

repoList.description: Makes it easy to create beautiful about screens for your apps
